profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.12 Implementation limits - Indirect obejcts
profile.description: A conforming file shall not contain more than 8388607 indirect objects
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain more than 8388607 indirect objects

error.message: Maximum number of indirect objects (8,388,607) in a PDF file exceeded
